name: @gobum/it
description: The simplest test driver for JavaScript

scripts.test: npm run okey --slient && npm run fail --slient && npm run error --slient
scripts.okey: npm run build --silent && node it test/okey/*.js
scripts.fail: npm run build --silent && node it test/fail/*.js
scripts.miss: npm run build --silent && node it test/miss/*.js
scripts.error: npm run build --silent && node it test/error/*.js
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish --access public
